html:
April 13 (Reuters) - J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC:

  • J.P. MORGAN SEC PLC AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - PROPOSED PLACING OF SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA PLC

  • J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC - HAS BEEN APPOINTED BY INSTITUTIONAL SELLER TO SELL ABOUT 50 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA PLC

  • J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC - PRICE PER PLACING SHARE WILL BE DETERMINED THROUGH AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD PROCESS

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
